communications.subject: Arizona Public Records Law Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Scottsdale Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: RE: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Elizabethtown Police Department)
communications.communication:
Please fill out our Right To know request form. Thank you! Lynn

Lynn Mohr
Elizabethtown Police Dept.
600 South Hanover Street
Elizabethtown, PA 17022
Phone: 717.367.6540 x231
Fax:     717.367.2332
This e-mail and any files transmitted with it are confidential and are intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. This communication may contain material protected by the Criminal History Record Information Act. If you are not the intended recipient or the person responsible for delivering this e-mail to the intended recipient, be advised that you have received this e-mail in error and that any use, dissemination, forwarding, printing or copying of this e-mail is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please immediately notify the Elizabethtown Police Department by replying to this message and deleting it from your computer or contact us at this telephone number (717) 367-6540.

Good Morning,
You will need to fill out a Right to Know Request form. At that time .  The information of your request will be reviewed and then approved or denied by the interim Chief.  All names will be redacted from report(s).

communications.subject: Welcome to the City of Troy's FOIL Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 
Thank you for registering with the City of Troy's FOIL Records Center. 
Your Login ID is:  149244-64556424@requests.muckrock.com 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HYdxLOL2gU5oRgYdNVDNo6seBY0rXJ3PyX0ubgxm9P2yqiFbh4bV9ckc-2FECoR7870A-3D-3DT43X_0HTxIShoizJZfal373-2BaVBInAkIYdnDVN0m0bSRgn7RZLOYqve0O-2BlIwm224iMyMQC6bBNnUrF31qZ-2BKPqem5zzSTtYQ3F-2FymJoaLyshU-2B-2Beugw1H6b5MmmPhcEEJ4thnGIpAXPpN-2FBnfnkcOLntbjZKflji7e0Apx6BjdvTZM0YvM6NtgJN6ElAszpV2TCyRpoNJIpD7Jd-2FPxDjjt64FHv1bCe3JDW2rmMab-2F7-2BqUQ-3D)

communications.communication:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Troy Police Department

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 
 
Thank you for submitting a public records request to the City of St. Louis OR the St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department. 
 
If you did not submit your request through a Public Records Portal, an account has been created for you and you can now track the progress of this request, communicate directly with staff and receive most open records electronically. 
 
Please note, you can use the same Log-in for the City of St. Louis Public Records Portal OR the (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HTlIccejzKd5Zy5e17XkUYReoC4lkjH7N3tXeckovooOjj0VOMfykmcmcgV2k3SuZKU0Etu6mmdGvJDTiPvjGDk-3D570g_AQwG9wmo2Gs-2BO9FzfPDbew6v6AqL2NlKYHjvM4ZyEwRMvXF9U7TkKJLjQeVil1gErFvGwz8-2Ba4F9YSBYlihoo78yeI7jZibO9wfAUZTM56O1mJHL8BTJ4FDZ6FRzvfp2NyevQSd6fU4SxlN2DyzTo90-2F36khp8JHN10ambooARrI1HmaTcfh0zIuSo-2BxTHfH9dEA4W328lVG-2FhD2FiiBMXg5hijGzQ1way1Q1j-2B-2Bj0g-3D) SLMPD Public Records Portal. communications.subject: SLMPD - Public Records Request :: P021902-071723
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
Thank you for submitting a records request to the St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department.  Your request was given reference number P021902-071723, for tracking purposes. Type of Records Selected: Other Police Record Complaint Number (if applicable): Type of Incident (if applicable): Description of Request (if applicable):   To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fst-louis-metropolitan-police-department-671%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policies-st-louis-metropolitan-police-department-149275%252F%253F&url_auth_token=AAAj9WsQ4FuNTZD2Y9DnVAucV28%3A1qLLx5%3AaHhFL1dAl0J3DlmmJxaXiAXZngGS5wNKxpcYfEkLRNU 
We are currently reviewing your request and will contact you if any additional information is required.  Otherwise, we will proceed with locating and gathering responsive records from various departments.  Once records are located, they will need to be reviewed to determine what may be released at this time.  All records are released in accordance with the Missouri Sunshine Law, Chapter 610 and SLMPD Policy. 
There will be a cost associated with this request, and you will be contacted with more details prior to records being released.  The earliest records are typically available is as follows: 
• Arrest Reports, Background Checks, Crash Reports, Police Calls for Service, Law Enforcement Requests and Non-criminal Police Reports are available within 10 days of submission of your request. 
• Criminal Police Reports, evidentiary material and other non-standard requests are available within 30 days of submission. 
In the event your request will require additional time you will be provided with a detailed explanation of any further delay. 
 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. 
 
Thank you! 
 
To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the SLMPD Public Records Portal (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HXKlOqhFxFGl1qpcWGCRpN2p6FkZS8KJuLPxrqfVx7pCdol8qSCOELmM1pTgk231Yg-3D-3D-U_C_AQwG9wmo2Gs-2BO9FzfPDbew6v6AqL2NlKYHjvM4ZyEwRMvXF9U7TkKJLjQeVil1gECE7Xuyt-2BcNyDk-2FjXhlK3ysOsdDpzyVY1HZ-2BT-2F5CyUg0Kcpr86BUaFeALqJAgM1s7K0xcBLCf-2BTLGKEpkQjaCVQ4QP3LruWiFPkEPe7MAt5bkOAPDDO6mDAXYFM0YC-2Bi7FLGv3bZhr02f2gq9FB-2BgxwCpX-2B4cKCTq98TKedDAjdI-3D)
